tables.title: Dungeon Crossroads
tables.description: Moments that make corridors feel alive.

entries.result: A sliding wall resets the map, revealing an unfamiliar passage.
Animated armor demands a password last spoken centuries ago.
Torchlight flickers as a rival delve party flees an unseen threat.
A spectral scribe offers guidance in exchange for a written secret.
A heavy portcullis crashes down, splitting the party in two.
A pool reflects the next room instead of the current hallway.
A mimic disguised as a rope bridge tests cautious explorers.
Echoes of drums rise; the denizens rally to defend their lair.
A prisoner begs release, promising a secret shortcut.
A shrine mural animates to quiz the heroes on local legends.

tables.title: Dungeon Atmosphere Prompts
tables.description: Flavor to set tone between combats.

entries.result: Moss grows in the outline of a vanished door.
Faint singing echoes, resolving into the party's marching tune.
Dust falls as something massive shifts overhead.
Carved names of past delvers glow briefly when touched.
A cold breeze carries the smell of rainâ€”impossible this deep.
Skeletons arranged as though dining silently at a stone table.
Whispers try to finish each hero's sentences.
A rusted bell rings once, then crumbles into dust.

tables.title: Underground Hazards
tables.description: Low-prep hazards to mix into dungeon movement.

entries.result: Poison gas seeps from cracks; holding breath is required to proceed.
Flooded stairs demand Athletics checks or falling prone.
Sonic resonances disorient; spoken commands echo as thunderclaps.
A magic null zone suppresses spells for the next two rooms.
An unstable ceiling sheds debris whenever loud noises occur.
A rotating hallway realigns destination doors each hour.
